std.value: Bob was hungry after three hours of work in the office. He took out his phone and ordered a takeout. Half an hour later, the takeout was sent to Bob. Bob went out of the office. He saw his colleague taking out a lunch box. Bob asked his colleague whether she cooked it by herself. His colleague smiled and said, "Yes. I do it every day as I don't want to order a takeout. It's not healthy."

std.value: Bob was hungry after three hours of work in the office. After thinking a while for what to eat for dinner, he suddenly noticed a sizzling pizza on the poster. It was just 18 yuan and looked so delicious. Immediately, he switched on his cell phone and logged on to the takeaway food platform. It wasn't long before the deliveryman sent the food to Bob, so Bob came back to his office and started to eat. At the same time, one of his colleagues went by, with a lunchbox held in hand. Bob inquired her whether her dinner was self-made. She replied "yes", and stated takeaway food was not healthy to the body. They exchanged smile at the reply.

std.value: Bob was hungry after three hours of work in the office. Suddenly, he felt hungry and wanted to order some food, so he took out his mobile phone. When Bob was scrolling the screen, an advertisement with grilled food attracted his eyes. At a reasonable price, Bob ordered the food on the platform of Meituan Waimai. It didn't take long time for him to wait for the takeout. Bob walked by and found his workmate was having the meal, and he asked her whether she had cooked the meal by herself. The girl smiled. She said she cooked food by herself because takeout food is not good for our health.
